comment.body:
> @Zeop87 Hello. This domain is a tracking domain, as far as I can see the site itself is not blocked. Please send us the page where the link is located so that we can verify that it is not tracking or advertising. Or unblock this domain in the user's DNS rules:
> 
> `@@||l.bfmtv.com^`
> 
> username is not active

Hello
the link is a link from a Facebook page of a French media. 
I don't understand why, despite the filter, it doesn't work. I don't have any other requests blocked on AdGuard app. 
Are there blocked requests that do not appear on the application?

issue.title: winfuture.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

issue.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.2.7 to 15.2.8

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: javascript
labels.description: Pull requests that update Javascript code

issue.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.2.7 to 15.2.8.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

  • 8d8fe23 build: update repository url in package.json
  • f0480f0 Revert "chore(changeset): release (#1461)"

  • cc04e08 ci: add required permission for provenance generation
  • fa2dac8 Revert "chore(changeset): release (#1455)"
  • 8325985 chore(changeset): release (#1455)
  • 92f295f build(deps): update dependencies (#1460)
  • 5293c09 build: generate provenance statements for npm package (#1459)
  • f184fff Merge pull request #1454 from Falcion/master
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.2.7 to 15.2.9
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.2.7 to 15.2.9.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.2.9

Patch Changes

  • #1463 b69ce2d Thanks @​iiroj! - Set the maximum number of event listeners to the number of tasks. This should silence the console warning MaxListenersExceededWarning: Possible EventEmitter memory leak detected.

v15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.2.9

Patch Changes

  • #1463 b69ce2d Thanks @​iiroj! - Set the maximum number of event listeners to the number of tasks. This should silence the console warning MaxListenersExceededWarning: Possible EventEmitter memory leak detected.

15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Commits
  • 0ce5e14 chore(changeset): release (#1465)
  • b69ce2d fix: set max event listeners to the number of tasks (#1463)
  • 52f6eef chore(changeset): release (#1462)
  • 8d8fe23 build: update repository url in package.json
  • f0480f0 Revert "chore(changeset): release (#1461)"
  • 1da81c0 chore(changeset): release (#1461)
  • cc04e08 ci: add required permission for provenance generation
  • fa2dac8 Revert "chore(changeset): release (#1455)"
  • 8325985 chore(changeset): release (#1455)
  • 92f295f build(deps): update dependencies (#1460)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

@Zeop87 Let's try another way:
1. Let's add one rule to the Safari user rules:
`2 tab --> Safari protection --> user rules --> add new rule:`
```
@@||l.bfmtv.com^
```
2. The second rule will be added to the allow list of DNS rules:
`2 tab --> DNS protection --> DNS filtering --> allowlist --> add a new rule:`
```
l.bfmtv.com
```

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

issue.title: winfuture.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

pull_request.title: Bump lint-staged from 15.2.7 to 15.2.9
pull_request.body:
Bumps [lint-staged](https://github.com/lint-staged/lint-staged) from 15.2.7 to 15.2.9.
Release notes

Sourced from lint-staged's releases.

v15.2.9

Patch Changes

  • #1463 b69ce2d Thanks @​iiroj! - Set the maximum number of event listeners to the number of tasks. This should silence the console warning MaxListenersExceededWarning: Possible EventEmitter memory leak detected.

v15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Changelog

Sourced from lint-staged's changelog.

15.2.9

Patch Changes

  • #1463 b69ce2d Thanks @​iiroj! - Set the maximum number of event listeners to the number of tasks. This should silence the console warning MaxListenersExceededWarning: Possible EventEmitter memory leak detected.

15.2.8

Patch Changes

  • f0480f0 Thanks @​iiroj! - In the previous version the native git rev-parse --show-toplevel command was taken into use for resolving the current git repo root. This version switched the --show-toplevel flag with --show-cdup, because on Git installed via MSYS2 the former was returning absolute paths that do not work with Node.js child_process. The new flag returns a path relative to the working directory, avoiding the issue.

    The GitHub Actions workflow has been updated to install Git via MSYS2, to ensure better future compatibility; using the default Git binary in the GitHub Actions runner was working correctly even with MSYS2.

Commits
  • 0ce5e14 chore(changeset): release (#1465)
  • b69ce2d fix: set max event listeners to the number of tasks (#1463)
  • 52f6eef chore(changeset): release (#1462)
  • 8d8fe23 build: update repository url in package.json
  • f0480f0 Revert "chore(changeset): release (#1461)"
  • 1da81c0 chore(changeset): release (#1461)
  • cc04e08 ci: add required permission for provenance generation
  • fa2dac8 Revert "chore(changeset): release (#1455)"
  • 8325985 chore(changeset): release (#1455)
  • 92f295f build(deps): update dependencies (#1460)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

comment.body:
Hello. It looks like AdGuard is using a rule that can't be converted in uBlock lists. Because of this, the rule is not triggered, and the banner is not blocked, with AdGuard extension the banner is hidden
`reddit.com#%#//scriptlet('hide-in-shadow-dom', 'xpromo-app-selector')`

comment.body:
Hello. The issue is caused by `RU AdList: Counters` — third-party filter. Unfortunately, we cannot fix it directly. 
You can add this rule to the user rules: 
`@@||eu.patagonia.com/on/demandware.static/*/images/1x1.png`
Or temporary disable this filter.

@dimisa-RUAdList Hello. Could you please take a look?

issue.title: timesofindia.indiatimes.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

comment.body:
> Не блокирует рекламу Яндекса. Постоянно лезет реклама от apple. Видимо сговор разрабов AdGuard и apple. Отвратительно что покупаешь лицензию, в надежде на то что будет заблокирована реклама, а получаешь столько же рекламы и еще минус потраченные деньги. В поддержке ничего нового ответить не могут. Отвратительно!

Apple сделали своё API блокировки контента, и запрещают использовать наши решения. Сравните цену блокировщика для iOS и для Android - всё прояснится.

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

issue.title: online.sberbank.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://online.sberbank.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonline.sberbank.ru%2F) ### Comment > Официальное мобильное приложение СберБанка для Сбербанк Online для Android. Версия актуальная текущая 15.12.0. Приложение скачано и установлено и обновляется не из какого-то магазина приложений а в виде apk-файла непосредственно с сайта банка. Если AdGuard включен то в настройках в приложении банка в разделе настроек Оформление->Заставки на входе полностью или частично не загружается графика, невозможно выбрать и установить другой набор заставок отличный от того что уже до этого был установлен по умолчанию или выбран пользователем. Наглядно на скриншотах. А если зайти ещё чуть глубже в настройки, т.е. попытаться выбрать конкретный набор заставок чтобы его установить, то там вообще белый экран будет, т.е. не будет показана графика этого набора заставок и не будет кнопки для его загрузки и установки. Если AdGuard временно выключить то всё в этом плане в приложении Сбербанка загружается и работает нормально. Username: `@NUser2018` ### Screenshots

issue.title: online.sberbank.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://online.sberbank.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonline.sberbank.ru%2F) ### Comment > Официальное мобильное приложение СберБанка для Сбербанк Online для Android. Версия актуальная текущая 15.12.0. Приложение скачано и установлено и обновляется не из какого-то магазина приложений а в виде apk-файла непосредственно с сайта банка. Если AdGuard включен то в настройках в приложении банка в разделе настроек Оформление->Заставки на входе полностью или частично не загружается графика, невозможно выбрать и установить другой набор заставок отличный от того что уже до этого был установлен по умолчанию или выбран пользователем. Наглядно на скриншотах. А если зайти ещё чуть глубже в настройки, т.е. попытаться выбрать конкретный набор заставок чтобы его установить, то там вообще белый экран будет, т.е. не будет показана графика этого набора заставок и не будет кнопки для его загрузки и установки. Если AdGuard временно выключить то всё в этом плане в приложении Сбербанка загружается и работает нормально. Username: `@NUser2018` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2rm5ucnk9omcoosc48ksgk0w88w8ww47afuvkoauq0.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gon2kglnbfkgw0cgo0sc44o8k4o4k4on8i4568epz4.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

Unfortunately, it cannot be unblocked in general filters.

labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: winfuture.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180595) if other issue.

issue.title: eodev.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

1.59.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

eodev.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Turkish filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The Turkish site of Brainly, eodev.com, has problems because it is not synchronized with Brainly other domains rules, even though there are no issues on Brainly itself. 

As a solution, all rules that include Brainly's other domains in the Adguard Annoyances filter list should have ",eodev.com" added to them. I tried this myself and got the same result as on Brainly without any problems. Thank you in advance.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot_2024-08-13-21-34-56-374_org mozilla firefox](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8135ed31-b80c-4421-988d-cf501d5bbd70)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![Screenshot_2024-08-13-21-34-25-734_org mozilla firefox](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/17abb077-92b8-4177-95e5-77af12ba5efb)
![Screenshot_2024-08-13-21-33-44-969_org mozilla firefox](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/de0036bf-c537-47b0-88d5-061ca625b5f3)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

> @Zeop87 Browser has DNS cache, you can try switching the browser off/on. Also try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update. Do not close AdGuard window 30-60 seconds. (so that content blockers have time to update)
> 
> If that doesn't help, please send a Facebook page where I could check the link.

@jellizaveta 
it didn’t work.
All link in posts on this page are concerned 
https://m.facebook.com/BFMTV/

if I only use the safari protection, I can load the page .
